articles.title: Norway dominates early medal standings with 6 medals
articles.summary: Team Norway has stormed to the top of the medal table with 3 gold, 1 silver and 2 bronze medals across multiple events

articles.title: USA claims double gold in early competition
articles.summary: United States athletes secure 2 gold medals, showing strong performance in the opening days of Milano Cortina 2026

articles.title: Japan shines with 4 medals including gold
articles.summary: Japanese athletes demonstrate excellence with 1 gold, 2 silver and 1 bronze across multiple disciplines

articles.title: Switzerland adds to medal tally with 3 total
articles.summary: Host-neighboring Switzerland secures 1 gold and 2 silver medals in alpine and cross-country events

articles.title: Italy celebrates home medals with strong start
articles.summary: Host nation Italy wins gold and silver, energizing home crowds in Milano and Cortina venues

articles.title: Austria and Germany battle for alpine supremacy
articles.summary: Both nations secure 3 medals each, with fierce competition in skiing events continuing throughout the games

articles.title: Czech Republic surprises with early gold medal
articles.summary: Czech athletes defy expectations with gold and silver medals in biathlon and cross-country skiing

articles.title: Figure skating competition heats up with spectacular performances
articles.summary: Athletes deliver breathtaking routines in the team event, setting the stage for individual competitions

articles.title: Speed skating records challenged in opening events
articles.summary: Athletes push the limits with near-record times in the 3000m and 5000m races at Oval Lingotto

articles.title: Ice hockey teams prepare for medal rounds
articles.summary: Group stage concludes with exciting matchups, setting up quarter-final battles for Olympic glory
